problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ABC和∠ACB的平分线交于点E,过点E作MN∥BC交AB于M,交AC于N,若BM+CN=8,则线段MN的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, the bisector of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersects at point E, crossing point E is MN ∥ BC intersects AB at M, intersects AC at N, if BM + CN = N_0, then the length of the line segment MN is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵∠ABC、∠ACB的平分线相交于点E,∴∠MBE=∠EBC,∠ECN=∠ECB,∵MN∥BC,∴∠EBC=∠MEB,∠NEC=∠ECB,∴∠MBE=∠MEB,∠NEC=∠ECN,∴BM=ME,EN=CN,∴MN=ME+EN,即MN=BM+CN．∵BM+CN=8,∴MN=8,故选:D．
